description: The I-864 Form requires the sponsor to provide detailed information about their income, assets, and financial obligations. The sponsor's income must be at least 125% of the Federal Poverty Guidelines for their household size, except for sponsors on active duty in the U.S. Armed Forces who are sponsoring their spouse or child, in which case the income requirement is 100% of the Federal Poverty Guidelines.
target_users: Sponsors of family-based immigrants and some employment-based immigrants

required_fields.name: Income
required_fields.description: Detailed information about the sponsor's income

required_fields.name: Assets
required_fields.description: Detailed information about the sponsor's assets

required_fields.name: Financial Obligations
required_fields.description: Detailed information about the sponsor's financial obligations

submission_method: Download Form I-864 from the USCIS website and submit it with the required supporting documents
notes_or_instructions: The form must be filled out in English, using black ink. Carefully follow the instructions and ensure all information provided is correct and up to date. Do not send original documents unless specifically requested in the form instructions or applicable regulations.
